article:
Self reflection means the process of how your mind evaluate  how much you have taken in the information you have received. Some people prefer to do _ self reflection in the mind, while others like to take notes to reflect. Whether you do it in your mind or through notes, the _ is the same.
School textbooks are divided into units of study. This can make it _ to do self reflection. Sometimes there is a test at the end of a unit. Preparing for the tests is a good time to reflect, especially for _ like math and science.
When you do self reflection, _ a quiet place. You won't like to be bothered when you are still working on your reflection. _ at school or home is a good choice, only if it's quiet. You can write down some notes on things you have learned in this unit. And then you can also note down the questions that you still wonder about. For example , how to solve the math problem on page 17? Writing these down will help you remember to _ looking for the answers.
Self reflection is an important skill for a _ student. If you have never taken the time to reflect, try it now!
